bio-asset inspected (Alphabeaver) A bio-asset's physical attributes have been recorded for use in demographic analysis. 1
GDZR_THOUGHT_ButcheredAnimalBoomrat
Icons/ZR_MeatKnowledge true
2 100 1
bio-asset inspected (Boomrat) A bio-asset's physical attributes have been recorded for use in demographic analysis. \nBio-engineered blisters of flamable fluid erupt on death, igniting though bioelectric spasm, and spreading flames over comparatively large areas relative to the small size of the species. \nHandling should be avoided in the absence of fire abatement. 1
GDZR_THOUGHT_ButcheredAnimalCapybara
Icons/ZR_MeatKnowledge true
2 100 1
bio-asset inspected (Capybara) A bio-asset's physical attributes have been recorded for use in demographic analysis. \nA large water loving verbrate, related to Earth rats. Despite their semiaquatic nature juicing is not reccomended. 1
GDZR_THOUGHT_ButcheredAnimalChinchilla
Icons/ZR_MeatKnowledge true
2 100 1
bio-asset inspected (Chinchilla) A bio-asset's physical attributes have been recorded for use in demographic analysis. \nDense, soft, pettable fur and extreme cutiness offer little too the Zetan assembly. 1
GDZR_THOUGHT_ButcheredAnimalGuineaPig
Icons/ZR_MeatKnowledge true
2 100 1
bio-asset inspected (Guinea Pig) A bio-asset's physical attributes have been recorded for use in demographic analysis. \nA popular livestock animal among humans this small herd animal produces unusually high levels of insulin production, prehaps explaining. 1

2 100 1
bio-asset inspected (Raccoon) A bio-asset's physical attributes have been recorded for use in demographic analysis. \nThis species has been known to inflitrate deep into our facilties in order to access our waste disposal areas. 1
\nA small warm blooded invertebrate orginally from the Human's home system. Planet of "Mars". -->

bio-asset inspected (Rat) A bio-asset's physical attributes have been recorded for use in demographic analysis. \nRats prey at night and stalk at night, often a group of rats will contain a rat of larger than normal size who makes many and/or all the rules. 1
